turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Can you order me some pizzas from Bella Luna for delivery?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want three medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what toppings would you like for your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a San Francisco Special on the first one. And then if I could get garlic and chicken on the second one. And then the third one, I just want plain cheese, but I want it with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'm not seeing a san francisco special at bella luna's perhaps you were talking about the seafood special?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one I was think about has pepperoni, sausage, Canadian bacon, black olives, and feta cheese. Can you do that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can order a meat lovers and add olives and substitute feta cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me go through your order with you, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, you don't Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are ordering 3 medium pizzas, one meatlovers with olives and feta cheese, 1 garlic and chicken, and 1 with extra cheese and no toppings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds about right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and you said you wanted delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, just to let you know, your total does not include tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I'll I'll make sure to have some cash ready for the driver.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be delivered in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think I'm good. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.
